text: Orlando dos Santos Costa is a Brazilian football striker. Orlando spent the majority of his career playing for the Belgian Pro League club Sporting Charleroi, making 151 appearances with 16 goals in seven seasons. ==References== ==External links== * worldsoccerstats.com * Profile at R. title: Orlando dos Santos Costa
